DOC.brief_summary: The investigator propose complete randomize control trial compare battlefield auricular acupuncture five point right ear five point leave ear ( cingulate gyrus , thalamus , omega 2 , point zero , shen men ) plus standard care , versus standard care alone , symptomatic treatment stent pain postoperative ureteral stent patient . Male female DoD beneficiary age 18 year old , schedule elective urologic surgery would expect routine placement ureteral stent ( ureteroscopy , ureteroscopy biopsy , ureteroscopy laser treatment stone , ESWL stone great 10mm ) recruit . Subjects follow 24 hour post surgery , 48 hour , 1 week , 1 month , 1 month post surgery . The investigator ask subject rate pain level 0-10 analogue scale , investigator assess via Ureteric Stent Symptoms Questionnaire ( USSQ ) subject ' urinary urgency , urinary frequency , quality life . The investigator ask subject many pill take pain include quantity dose assess reduction pain medication use .
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects age 18 year old schedule routine urologic surgery . To randomize subject , investigator employ random number generator , minimize difference study group . Screening Visit : Obtain sign Informed Consent document HIPAA Authorization . Review past medical history Armed Forces Health Longitudinal Technology Application ( AHLTA ) verify inclusion/exclusion criterion include previous encounter , vital sign review , medication list , co-morbidities , prior surgical history , demographic , problem list , note prior acupuncture receive . Subjects give Medication Log assist document amount pain medication take part standard care . Subjects give handout standard BFA Discharge Instructions include infection look like event infection ( see attach ) . Visit 1 ( Baseline ) : Subjects randomize 1 2 group : Group 1 : Standard operative standard post-operative care plus BFA ( 5 acupuncture needles* ear point cingulate gyrus , thalamus , omega 2 , shen-men , point zero , identify point-finder ) Group 2 : Standard treatment alone . Subjects give treatment accord randomization group . The investigator review subject 's medical record document standard care pain assessment perform upon admission pain intervention Post Anesthesia Care Unit ( PACU ) Same Day Surgery Unit ( SDSU ) . The investigator also record amount standard care pain medication use hospital stay . All subject , regardless randomization group , instruct heavy meal , excessive hot cold food , heavy exercise intercourse , alcohol 24 hour Visit 1 . Ear Acupuncture needle fall within one week . Visit # 2 ( 24 hour post-surgery ) : Subject contact in-person , via phone , email , text message ask : On scale 0-10 , 10 bad pain , pain level ? Have return work resume normal household duty ? If , many hour post-surgery ? What pain medication take ? And strength ? How many total dos take since surgery ? Essentris electronic inpatient medical record review determine total dose pain medication receive still hospital . Is patient void without irritative symptom ? Urinary frequency , urgency , dysuria , hematuria assess . Visit # 3 ( 48 hour post- surgery ) Subject contact either in-person , via phone , email text message ask : On scale 0-10 , 10 bad pain , level pain ? Have return work resume normal household duty ? If , many hour post-surgery ? What pain medication take ? And strength ? How many total dos take since surgery ? Essentris electronic inpatient medical record review determine total dose pain medication receive still hospital . Is patient void without irritative symptom ? Urinary frequency , urgency , dysuria , hematuria assess . Visit # 4 ( 1 week post-surgery ) Subject contact either in-person , via phone , email text message ask : Have return work resume normal household duty ? If , many day post-surgery ? What pain medication take ? And strength ? How many total dos take since surgery ? USSQ ( Stent Situ ) administer patient . Visit # 5 Visit ( 1 month post surgery stent in-situ 5 week post stent removal week 1 ) Subject contact either in-person , via phone , email text message ask : Have return work resume normal household duty ? If , many day post-surgery ? What pain medication take ? And strength ? How many total dos take since surgery ? USSQ ( Post Stent ) administer patient .
DOC.criteria: THIS STUDY IS BEING CONDUCTED AT A MILITARY INSTALLATION . YOU MUST HAVE MILITARY INSURANCE IN ORDER TO PARTICIPATE IN THIS STUDY . Inclusion : Male female DoD beneficiary Age 18 year old schedule elective urologic surgery would expect routine placement ureteral stent ( ureteroscopy , ureteroscopy biopsy , ureteroscopy laser treatment stone , extracorporeal stone wave lithotripsy ( ESWL ) stone great 10mm ) . Exclusion : Pregnant breastfeeding . Traumatic ureteral injury repair stent . Ureteral stent place procedure urologic cancer treatment . Sepsis prior stent placement active urologic infection . Absence ear . Active cellulitis ear . Ear anatomy preclude identification acupuncture landmarks . NonEnglish speaking . Use Hearing Aids preclude insertion ASP needle . Inability comply study protocol . Patients receive treatment chronic pain condition .
